backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (User, Pro, Booking, Notification, Transaction), stable storage with upgrade hooks, and access control via MixinAuthorization for a beauty-services booking platform on ICP.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with their target files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels, covering LoginScreen loop fix, useAppState rewrite, App.tsx router, and more.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON catalog of concise per-file summaries for all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose, props, and key design details.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind base/components/utilities and defining light and dark mode CSS custom property tokens for the design system (colors, radius, sidebar, charts).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the NEXUS Vite/React app, mounting the React root at `#root` and loading `src/main.tsx` as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wires `useAppState` to a 28-case screen router, passes common props to all screen components, and renders Toast and NotifsPanel overlays.
frontend/src/components/BottomSheet.tsx: Reusable modal bottom sheet component with dark overlay, slide-up animation, drag handle, optional title header with close button, scrollable content, and optional sticky footer; adapts to a centered dialog on desktop (≥768px).
frontend/src/components/BtnPrimary.tsx: A reusable primary button component supporting loading, danger, small, and icon variants with press-scale animations and inline styles.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header component with back button or logo, optional centered title, role-switch button, and notifications bell with unread badge.
frontend/src/components/icons/index.tsx: Exports a collection of reusable SVG icon components (Flash, Search, Check, X, Bell, Radar, Wallet, Grid, Edit, etc.) with configurable size, color, and style props.
frontend/src/components/NotifsPanel.tsx: A slide-in notifications side panel that displays typed notifications with icons/colors and supports mark-all-read and close actions.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCircle.t: An SVG circular progress indicator that changes color based on progress value and displays the percentage as centered text.
frontend/src/components/TabBarAdmin.tsx: Bottom navigation tab bar for the admin role with four tabs: Dashboard, Pros, Bookings, and Revenue, highlighting the active screen.
frontend/src/components/TabBarClient.tsx: Bottom navigation tab bar for the client role with Explorer, Reservations, Alertes, and Profil tabs, including an unread notifications badge on Alertes.
frontend/src/components/TabBarPro.tsx: Renders a bottom navigation bar for the Pro interface with four tabs (Radar, Wallet, Accueil, Business), highlighting the active tab with a gold indicator and scale animation.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Displays a stack of dismissible toast notifications with type-specific icons and colors (success, error, info, sms, warning), using fade-in/slide animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Entry CSS file that imports the global stylesheet from styles/globals.css.
frontend/src/lib/actor.ts: Utility module for managing an AuthClient singleton and creating authenticated or anonymous ICP actors, with login, logout, and principal helper functions.
frontend/src/lib/payrexx.ts: Builds Payrexx TWINT payment URLs for Pro subscriptions (19.90 CHF/month) and one-time booking payments, encoding all required query parameters including redirect URLs and custom fields.
frontend/src/lib/twilio.ts: Stub module for Twilio SMS OTP integration with `sendOTP` and `verifyOTP` functions that log calls and simulate success in development.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/admin/AdminBookings: Admin screen displaying a filterable list of demo bookings with status badges (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled) and a bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/screens/admin/AdminDashboar: Admin dashboard showing animated KPI counters, recent bookings, and a pending-pros validation panel fetched from the backend canister.
frontend/src/screens/admin/AdminLoginScr: Admin login screen with email/password form that authenticates against hardcoded credentials and redirects to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/screens/admin/AdminProsScre: Admin screen listing professionals with status/city filters and validate/refuse actions, seeded with demo data and optionally populated from the backend.
frontend/src/screens/admin/AdminRevenusS: Admin revenue screen showing an animated monthly bar chart and a transaction list with total commissions summary.
frontend/src/screens/auth/LoginScreen.ts: Landing login screen with animated background orbs, a glass-card UI, and a connect button that navigates to the role selection screen after an 800ms simulated delay.
frontend/src/screens/auth/OTPScreen.tsx: Two-step OTP authentication screen: first collects a Swiss phone number, then shows a 4-digit code input with auto-verify, resend countdown, and role-based navigation on success.
frontend/src/screens/auth/RoleScreen.tsx: Role selection screen presenting 'Client' and 'Pro' cards; sets the chosen role in global state and navigates to the OTP screen.
frontend/src/screens/client/AlertesScree: Client notifications screen displaying demo alerts with type-specific icons and colors, supporting mark-as-read per item or all at once.
frontend/src/screens/client/Booking1Scre: First step of the client booking flow where the user selects a service from the pro's list; saves the selection to global state and advances to step 2.
frontend/src/screens/client/Booking2Scre: Step 2 of the booking flow where clients select a time slot (e.g., 'Dans 1 heure', 'Ce soir') from a predefined list, with flash availability badges, before proceeding to step 3.
frontend/src/screens/client/Booking3Scre: Step 3 of the booking flow that collects the client's service address, city (from a Swiss city dropdown), phone number, and optional notes, with validation before advancing to step 4.
frontend/src/screens/client/Booking4Scre: Step 4 of the booking flow displaying a summary recap card (professional, service, slot, address, total in CHF) and a confirm button that generates a booking ID and navigates to the processing screen.
frontend/src/screens/client/Booking5Scre: A processing/waiting screen shown after booking confirmation that displays an animated hourglass with a countdown progress bar, then auto-redirects to the live status screen after 8 seconds.
frontend/src/screens/client/ClientProfil: The client profile screen allowing users to view and inline-edit their name, phone, and email, see payment history, and log out with a two-tap confirmation.
frontend/src/screens/client/ExplorerScre: The main explorer/discovery screen listing demo beauty professionals (coiffure, esthétique, onglerie, massage) with filtering, ratings, flash availability, and navigation to pro detail and booking flows.
frontend/src/screens/client/FicheProScre: Displays a professional's profile page with animated stats (bookings, rating, reviews), their services list, and reviews, allowing the client to book a service which navigates to the booking flow.
frontend/src/screens/client/LiveStatusSc: Shows a real-time booking status screen with a 30-minute countdown timer, a step-by-step timeline, and booking summary, simulating pro confirmation after 6 seconds.
frontend/src/screens/client/Reservations: Displays the client's upcoming and completed bookings in a tabbed list with status badges and countdown chips for each reservation.
frontend/src/screens/pro/ProBusinessScre: Multi-tab pro profile editor (Profil, Services, Tarifs, Galerie) with a progress circle score, tab completion tracking, and save/navigation logic for onboarding a professional.
frontend/src/screens/pro/ProDashboardScr: Pro dashboard showing animated monthly metrics (appointments, revenue, rating), a flash mode toggle, and a greeting with today's date.
Pro radar screen displaying pending booking requests, confirmed bookings, and history in a tabbed layout, with accept/decline actions that call the backend actor and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/screens/pro/ProWalletScreen: Pro wallet screen showing available balance, an animated weekly earnings bar chart, transaction history, and a bank transfer action with loading state.
frontend/src/screens/pro/SubscriptionMod: Subscription modal presenting NEXUS Pro plan benefits and a 7-day free trial offer, redirecting to Payrexx payment or activating the pro account locally if no payment secret is configured.
frontend/src/screens/pro/SuccessScreen.t: Post-subscription success screen with a confetti animation, animated progress bar, and a checkmark reveal, then a CTA to navigate to the pro dashboard.
frontend/src/screens/pro/tabs/ServiceEdi: Bottom-sheet form for creating or editing a pro service, with fields for name, price, duration, description, badge, and delivery mode.
frontend/src/screens/pro/tabs/TabGalerie: Gallery tab allowing pros to upload up to four profile photos via a 2x2 grid, with a progress bar, minimum-photo validation, and photo tips.
frontend/src/screens/pro/tabs/TabPaiemen: React tab component for managing pro payment settings (TWINT phone number and Swiss IBAN), with inline validation, formatted display, and a financial summary section showing commission and subscription details.
React tab component for editing a pro's profile information including name, slogan, bio (200-char limit), service category, intervention location type, city, and salon address.
frontend/src/screens/pro/tabs/TabService: React tab component for managing a pro's service list, with category-based defaults, support for adding/editing/deleting services via a ServiceEditor modal, and reordering/toggling active state.
React tab component for configuring a pro's availability schedule (per-day time ranges), flash mode with supplement pricing, minimum booking delay, and cancellation policy.
frontend/src/state/useAppState.ts: Central application state hook defining all TypeScript interfaces (screens, roles, toasts, notifications, booking data, pro data) and the global state shape with initial defaults for the entire app.
frontend/src/styles/globals.css: Global CSS file defining the dark design system with CSS custom properties (color palette, spacing, layout vars), reset rules, typography, form/button base styles, layout utilities (screen-root, scroll-zone, cta-zone), and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers for persisting values to/from sessionStorage and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with Inter font, oklch-based semantic color tokens, custom border radii, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (v25) documenting NEXUS v8.0 architecture decisions, known bugs (auth loop, OTP/role screen issues, layout overflow), and a registry of implemented features for the Swiss beauty marketplace built on ICP/Motoko with TWINT payments.
